    attributeStrides: [Int],

[`func setVertexBytes(UnsafeRawPointer, length: Int, attributeStride: Int, index: Int)`](/documentation/metal/mtlrendercommandencoder/setvertexbytes(_:length:attributestride:index:))**Required**
